intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: You’re the Dark Priestess... No, the Dark Dragon.

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: ...Why do you hinder my path?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: What...?

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: I have been commanded to lead this world. I shall make the world a better place. Why do you stand in my way?

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: ...You’re wrong. You were only told that the world would become a better place. The person who ordered you is already dead. So stop! You no longer have any reason to fight!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: You... No, we... We have no reason to fight.

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: ...A long time ago... I have a feeling that I heard those same words. Soft words, like a warm breeze... But that was long ago... I have been asleep for too long. In the darkness, I was dreaming... An empty dream, white, colorless... But now I am awake. His Majesty willed me so.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Majesty... Zephiel!

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: I have woken. I am no longer who I used to be. I now clearly understand what I must do.

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: I must lead this world... No matter how many days or nights pass, I must. I must...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: You insist on fighting us?

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: If you stand in my path...

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Such strong...will...

intro.speaker: Idunn
intro.line: His Majesty wishes it to be. And I was woken to answer his Majesty’s calls.

intro.speaker: Alen
intro.line: I will protect Master Roy with my life!

intro.speaker: Lance
intro.line: Master Roy, Lord Eliwood... I shall show you my gratitude now!

intro.speaker: Marcus
intro.line: Master Roy, please be careful.

intro.speaker: Wolt
intro.line: No matter what happens, I will protect Master Roy...

intro.speaker: Bors
intro.line: I must fight a worthy battle as an Ostian knight!

intro.speaker: Elen
intro.line: Saint Elimine... Give us strength!

intro.speaker: Dieck
intro.line: Whoo... Now there’s something you don’t see every day!

intro.speaker: Wade
intro.line: This is it! The great battle I’ve been waiting for!

intro.speaker: Lot
intro.line: We must be wary...

intro.speaker: Shanna
intro.line: All right! Chaaaaarge!

intro.speaker: Lugh
intro.line: ...I won’t lose. I can defend us all!

intro.speaker: Chad
intro.line: I have friends I can trust. There’s no way I could lose now!

intro.speaker: Clarine
intro.line: This is the end! We mustn’t lose now!

intro.speaker: Rutger
intro.line: ...It begins.

intro.speaker: Saul
intro.line: Well, well... Let’s go, I suppose.

intro.speaker: Dorothy
intro.line: Can we win...? No, we have to win!

intro.speaker: Sue
intro.line: Is this the end? Or is it the beginning...

intro.speaker: Zelot
intro.line: Now, Ilia will know peace...

intro.speaker: Trec
intro.line: Sigh... Give me a break...

intro.speaker: Noah
intro.line: Yeah, we’ll be fine.

intro.speaker: Astolfo
intro.line: This could be dangerous... Well, I’ve been in enough dangerous situations already.

intro.speaker: Lilina
intro.line: Father... Watch over us.

intro.speaker: Wendy
intro.line: You’ll be fine, Wendy... Just trust in yourself.

intro.speaker: Barth
intro.line: We cannot afford to make a mistake this time.

intro.speaker: Ogier
intro.line: I know I’ve become strong... Now’s the time to show it!

intro.speaker: Fir
intro.line: I will win. I will win!

intro.speaker: Sin
intro.line: ...We’ve finally come this far.

intro.speaker: Geese
intro.line: I hope this’ll be the last battle.

intro.speaker: Gonzalez
intro.line: I’m not afraid! This time I’m not afraid!

intro.speaker: Klein
intro.line: The long battle is about to end.

intro.speaker: Thea
intro.line: I...will not lose!

intro.speaker: Echidna
intro.line: This is the end... Finally, it’ll end...

intro.speaker: Larum
intro.line: It’s...huge...

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: Let there be peace in your dying heart...

intro.speaker: Bartre
intro.line: Aaaaaarrrr! My blood boils!

intro.speaker: Raigh
intro.line: This is the Dark Dragon...! Such immense power...! Yes...!

intro.speaker: Cath
intro.line: Well, let’s go then, shall we?

intro.speaker: Percival
intro.line: If we take our time...we can win.

intro.speaker: Melady
intro.line: I will not lose... For the troops back in Bern... ...For Gale...

intro.speaker: Cecilia
intro.line: Roy, concentrate.

intro.speaker: Sophia
intro.line: I can sense...a sad heart...

intro.speaker: Igrene
intro.line: Now...peace shall come again...

intro.speaker: Garret
intro.line: A truly powerful enemy! Haven’t met one in years!

intro.speaker: Fa
intro.line: ...Do we have to fight...sniff...

intro.speaker: Hugh
intro.line: Whoa! We gotta fight that thing!?

intro.speaker: Zeiss
intro.line: I’ll focus all my strength into this one thrust!

intro.speaker: Niime
intro.line: This is it! Yes! This is the power that I have been searching for!

intro.speaker: Juno
intro.line: The time has come...

intro.speaker: Dayan
intro.line: This is the Dark Dragon...

intro.speaker: Yoder
intro.line: Finally, the battle between Dragons and men will end at last...

intro.speaker: Karel
intro.line: So, let’s see the power of the Dragon.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: I won’t give up! I have the sword of Hartmut, who pitied you and did not kill you! Everyone, leave the final blow to me!

boss.speaker: Idunn
boss.line: I...I... Gah... I...alone... Dark... Alone... in... darkness...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What’s happening... The temple is starting to collapse! Everyone! Hurry outside!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Master Roy! Are you all right!?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Yes... But the temple is gone.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: It is over a thousand years old, and a lot of energy was released in the battles that we just fought. Probably the building couldn’t withstand it.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Well, Master Roy, this is the end.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: No, it’s not over yet. This is just the beginning. We have to help the land and the people recover from the war. We have much work to do. The real battle is just starting!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What’s happening... The temple is starting to collapse! Everyone! Hurry outside!

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I know. Leave the rest to me. Now go!

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: Master Roy! Are you all right!?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Yes... But the temple is gone.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: It is over a thousand years old, and a lot of energy was released in the battles that we just fought. Probably the building couldn’t withstand it.

end.speaker: Merlinus
end.line: So, times are changing again. And... Who is that you are carrying on your back?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Her? Oh, right. Merlinus, I need to ask you something...
